name: Paul Brown
description:
My name is Paul Brown from USA. I am 56 years and I am a military and I am calm and a very passionate man,I am very honest, trustworthy, kind, sincere, and caring man and I also love going to concerts theater and listening to classical music and I do not smoke or use drugs……
I am looking for a loyal, romantic, caring, honest, natural, lovely, kind, understanding and a wonderful good woman, a woman who will love me,who will give me the love i need from a woman,who will makes me happy always
